content: NCT 25 S-22 ACSR and guy wire cordless cable cutter Scissor-style cordless hydraulic cable cutter for ACSR cable and guy wire (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Pipe press tools, cutters, and crimpers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Minimize downtime – premium build quality with exclusive tool inspection, certification and repair services so your Hilti cordless cable cutters can better withstand the toughest jobsites Highest productivity – scissor-style blades to simplify one-handed operation, while easy blade replacement, auto-retract function and manual retract-stop help you to get the job done faster Comprehensive safety features – electronic trigger lock and audiovisual signals to better protect the operator while cutting More comfortable handling – slim grip, 350° head rotation and LED light make the cutter easier to control in tight spaces or when wearing utility gloves (Class 2 or Class 4) On the Nuron battery platform – cordless cable cutters without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries, robust build quality and a range of services to keep you productive, today and tomorrow Applications Cutting ACSR cable up to 557 kcmil (Eagle) Cutting EHS guy wire up to 3/8” and HS guy wire up to 7/16” ### TECHNICAL DATA: Cutting capacity: 3/8 guy wire (EHS), 557 kcmil ACSR (Eagle), 7/16 guy wire (HS), ACSR: Max. outer diameter 25 mm, Guy Wire (EHS): Max. outer diameter 9.5 mm, Guy Wire (HS): Max. outer diameter 11 mm Head rotation: 350 ° Dimensions (LxWxH): 4.9 x 3 x 16.4 in Technical Data | Cutting capacity | 3/8 guy wire (EHS), 557 kcmil ACSR (Eagle), 7/16 guy wire (HS), ACSR: Max. outer diameter 25 mm, Guy Wire (EHS): Max. outer diameter 9.5 mm, Guy Wire (HS): Max. outer diameter 11 mm | Head rotation | 350 ° | Dimensions (LxWxH) | 4.9 x 3 x 16.4 in ### ITEMS- 3782620 - NCT 25 S-22 STEEL CUTTER KIT - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NCT 25 S-22 Cordl. cable cutter - 1x C 4-22 02 110-127V Battery charger - 1x 15lb (6.8kg) Retaining strap assy - 2x B 22-85 Li-ion Battery pack - 1x Tool bag medium - 2252501 - Cordl. cable cutter NCT 25 S-22 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NCT 25 S-22 Cordl. cable cutter
